quotes.quote: Here is a test to find whether your mission on earth is finished â€“ If you're alive it isn't.

If you think you are too small to be effective, you have never been in the dark with a mosquito.

Silent gratitude isn't much use to anyone.

My theory is that if you look confident you can pull off anything â€“ even if you have no clue what you're doing.
A smile is an inexpensive way to change your looks.
Don't worry about the world coming to an end today. It is already tomorrow in Australia.
Laugh and the world laughs with you, snore and you sleep alone.Â
I believe that ifÂ lifeÂ gives you lemons, you should make lemonade. And try to find somebody whose life has given them vodka, and have a party.
Great spirits have always encountered violent opposition from mediocre minds.
Wine is constant proof that God loves us and loves to see us happy.Â
Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work.
You can't have everything. Where would you put it?
If you think you are too small to make a difference, try sleeping with a mosquito.
If you let your head get too big, it'll break your neck.
Don't go around saying the world owes you a living. The world owes you nothing. It was here first.
When I hear someone sigh that life is hard, I am tempted to ask, â€˜compared to what?'
Opportunity does not knock, it presents itself when you beat down the door.
Life is like a sewerâ€¦ what you get out of it depends on what you put into it.

The best way to cheer yourself up is to try to cheer somebody else up.
We are all here on earth to help others; what on earth the others are here for I don't know.Â
Goal setting is similar to travelling from point A to point B within a city. If you clearly understand what the goal is, you will definitely reach the destination because you know its address.
Even if you are on the right track, you'll get run over if you just sit there.
By working faithfully eight hours a day you may eventually get to be boss and work twelve hours a day.

I know worrying works, because none of the stuff I worried about ever happened.
Follow your passion, stay true to yourself, never follow someone else's path unless you're in the woods and you're lost and you see a path then by all means you should follow that.

We can see a thousand miracles around us every day. What is more supernatural than an egg yolk turning into a chicken?

If at first you don't succeed, think how many people you've made happy.

Live each day like it's your second to the last. That way you can fall asleep at night.

Dreams come true all the time, just not for the dreamers.
I find television very educational. Every time someone turns it on, I go in the other room and read a book.

A diamond is merely a lump of coal that did well under pressure.
